instance.description: Team Weapon entity for M2A1 105mm Howitzer

instance_reference.name: animator_attachments
instance_reference.comment:
REQUIRED TO HAVE AN ATTACHMENT LIST if there are to be any child attachments that rotates (like our weapon)
This is just a placeholder as a work around since it doesn't appear systems supports creating blank game objects.

bool.name: can_repair
bool.comment: Pretty sure this means nothing, but who knows if legacy AI code might think it does!

float.name: outer_height
float.comment:
Based on the comments, it feels like this should be less than 0 and it traditionally has been. However, through testing, it seems like even if this is set to 0, units are still able to see below them just fine.
NOTE: Jianfu suggested that this may exist just to soften the slope of the lampshade. -Brock 2017
